title: PLS GIVE ME 10 RP FOR PROJECT ZED
body: Hello, may i have 10 RP? I would like to buy the project zed skin. The shop discount ends in a couple hours. Thanks!

replies.body: i have 420 RP (lol) right now, and am planning on buying the 5$ card, giving me 1070 RP, when the discount Zed skin is 1080 RP.

Doesn't look like you're quite close enough for 10 RP to give you enough for Project Zed. Go ahead and get the rest of that RP, and shoot me your best drawing of a Project Poro and I can make that RP trade happen!
PLSSSS RESPOND QUICK LOL MY OFFER ENDS IN 2 hrs

Caught me while we were asleep fam sorry! Your Shop is officially over, but since you made this request **BEFORE** it was over, I'm gonna go ahead and hook you up. When you login, you should see the RP removed and the Project Zed unlocked.
yo broporo my offer is about to leave and i don't want to just be short 10 rp bro LOL plssssss
that drawing was actually legit tho {{sticker:sg-kiko}}
